perturbation.original_text: As consideration for Guaranty entering into the Credit Agreement to provide such loans for the Development Project and to ensure Project Completion. Prime absolutely and unconditionally warrants to Guaranty to fund the payment to Offshore of all costs that exzeed the available commitments under the Credit Agreement, including interest, for Project Completion. In the event Offshore is in Default under Section 7.1(f), (g),  (h) and/or (i) ofthe Credit Agreement, then Prime absolutely and unconditionally warrants to Guaranty" the assumption of all costs for Project Completion.
perturbation.changed_text: As consideration for Guaranty entering into the Credit Agreement to provide such loans for the Development Project and to facilitate Project Completion, Prime intends to provide financial support to Offshore for costs exceeding available commitments under the Credit Agreement, including interest, for Project Completion. In the event Offshore is in Default under Section 7.1(f), (g), (h) and/or (i) of the Credit Agreement, Prime will consider assisting Guaranty with the assumption of costs for Project Completion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text creates an absolute and unconditional warranty. The modified text replaces this with 'intends to provide financial support' and 'will consider assisting,' which are vague and do not create a binding obligation. This ambiguity makes the enforceability of Prime's financial commitment unclear.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of Contract Law under Texas Law - weakens the enforceability of a guarantee which is a type of contract.

perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states Prime's obligation to maintain a specific level of liquidity. The modified text changes 'maintain liquidity consisting of unused revolver availability... and/or unrestricted cash and cash equivalents of $25,000,000' to 'attempt to maintain liquidity consisting of available funds,' and the language 'agrees to fund additional shareholder loans' becomes 'may provide additional shareholder loans if reasonably practical.' This replaces a fixed, quantifiable requirement with vague language, making it difficult to enforce the liquidity maintenance provision.

perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that the agreement remains in force until Project Completion is satisfied, at which time Prime's warranty expires. The modified text introduces ambiguity by stating the agreement remains in force until 'in Prime's reasonable opinion, each component of Project Completion is substantially achieved.' Also, the obligation for Prime's warranty is changed to 'Prime's obligations regarding funding for that component may be reviewed and potentially adjusted.' This introduces subjectivity, allowing Prime to unilaterally determine when its obligations cease, weakening the guarantee.
